The Importance of Commenting HTML

Benefits

  • Easy for team members to understand
  • Discern whatâ€™s going on more quickly in old code
  • Much easier to read when your code gets lengthy
  • Sublime Text makes it very easy with the shortcut cmd+/
  • Ensure your end div tags exist

Application

<!-- opening comment -->
<!-- /closing comment -->

Example

<!-- container -->
<div class="container">
  <!-- main-header -->
  <header id="main-header" role="banner">
    <h1 id="logo">Logo</h1>
    <!-- main-navigation -->
    <nav id="main-navigation" role="navigation">
      <ul>
        <li><a href="#">Link</a></li>
        <li><a href="#">Link</a></li>
        <li><a href="#">Link</a></li>
        <li><a href="#">Link</a></li>
      </ul>
    </nav>
    <!-- /main-navigation -->
  </header>
  <!-- /main-header -->
</div>
<!-- /container -->
